page.title: 19A Working Mum's Day
page.content: Mum gets up in the morning and gets washed and dressed.She gets us out of bed and then she gets the breakfast. After breakfast she packs our lunchboxes and then gets us off to school.When we have gone mum clears the breakfast dishes and washes them.She does the washing and ironing and tidies the house.At about 11am mum has a coffee break.After her coffee she starts work in the cafe.At 3.30 she picks Alice up and she waits for Lucy and me to come out of school.When she gets back she prepares the tea.When she has eaten her tea she goes back to work while dad has his tea.At 10.30 when the cafe has closed mum comes in and she puts her feet up and she reads the paper.At 11.00 mum goes to bed.
